thread.title: Cincinnati weather: Slightly warmer temps, widespread rain forecast for the weekend
thread.title_full: Cincinnati weather: Slightly warmer temps, widespread rain forecast for the weekend

author: Haadiza Ogwude, Cincinnati Enquirer
title: Cincinnati weather: Slightly warmer temps, widespread rain forecast for the weekend
text:
Cincinnati weather: Slightly warmer temps, widespread rain forecast for the weekend Haadiza Ogwude, Cincinnati Enquirer Fri, December 13, 2024 at 11:43 AM UTC 2 min read
After a cold start to the day, slightly warmer air will build into the region Friday through Saturday.
According to the National Weather Service in Wilmington , widespread cloud cover will keep temperatures relatively stable in the upper teens to mid-20s on Friday morning. Thicker mid-level to high clouds will spread over the region through daybreak.
The rest of the day will remain mostly cloudy, with highs around 30 degrees in the north to around 40 degrees in the south.
Advertisement Advertisement Advertisement Tranquil weather conditions are forecast for early Saturday, with seasonably cold conditions continuing. Highs will climb into the lower 40s in the north to the lower 50s in the south.
Widespread rain is expected from Saturday evening into Sunday. Widespread rain will taper off by Sunday afternoon, though breezy conditions will linger.
Widespread precipitation will return to the region Monday afternoon through evening. Winds will be around 15 mph, gusting to 30 mph.
The area is forecast to accumulate between one to two inches of rainfall with localized higher amounts Saturday night through Monday night. Another chance for precipitation will occur mid-week. The National Weather Service will monitor flooding threats during this unsettled period.
Friday remains dry before our next weather system arrives Saturday evening into the overnight hours with widespread rainfall. pic.twitter.com/nNgh43y1SG
— NWS Wilmington OH (@NWSILN) December 13, 2024
Detailed 7-day Cincinnati weather forecast Friday : Partly sunny, with a high near 38. East wind around 7 mph.
Advertisement Advertisement Advertisement Friday night : Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming mostly clear, with a low of around 26. East wind around 6 mph.
Saturday : Mostly cloudy, with a high near 49. East wind around 8 mph.
Saturday night: Rain. Low around 40. Southeast wind 8 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. The chance of precipitation is 100%. New precipitation amounts between a half and three-quarters of an inch possible.
Sunday : Rain. High near 51. Southeast wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. The chance of precipitation is 100%. New precipitation amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.
Sunday night: Rain likely, mainly before 1 a.m. Cloudy, with a low of around 47. The chance of precipitation is 70%. New precipitation amounts of less than a tenth of an inch possible.

Police used it to charge her grandmother with murder in a cold case CNN Joe Burrow Said His “Privacy Has Been Violated In More Ways Than One” After Model Olivia Ponton Was Named As The 22-Year-Old “Employee” Who Reported The Robbery At His Home BuzzFeed UCLA student sues California doctors, says she was 'fast-tracked' into transgender surgery NBC News Monday : Rain. High near 58. The chance of precipitation is 90%.
Tuesday : Mostly sunny, with a high near 49.
Wednesday: There will be a chance of rain. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 45. The chance of precipitation is 30%.
Thursday: There is a chance of rain. Partly sunny, with a high near 39. The chance of precipitation is 30%.
Source: National Weather Service, Wilmington.
This article originally appeared on Cincinnati Enquirer: Cincinnati weather: Widespread rain, slight warm-up this weekend
